reviewText: Excellent copy. Fabulous movie--one of the best!!!

A favorite movie as a teenager to rent from my local public library in Escondido on VHS tape in the late 1980's. Now that there is this official DVD version (not the Chinese bootleg version) I'm so pleased to be share this exciting and noble adventure with the lads from Down Under once again.
Good copy, better than the Korean version also available.  Great movie, well acted, on site, not a Hollywood piece of trash.

One of the most exciting war stories on film. The true telling of Australian Lighthorsemen making a bold charge on the water rich stronghold at Beersheba during World War I is made even more compelling by Mario Millo's brilliant musical score. One of the best!
